title: Disguise Self
content:
ion: Magically change all aspects of your appearance. Until Long Rest Level: Lvl 1 Spell School: Illusion Casting Time: Action Range: Self Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None Additional Details: Disguise self changes the caster into another race, from the following options: Halfling, Half-Elf, Elf, Dwarf, Tiefling, Drow, Human, and Githyanki. The caster can also change their gender. Ritual Spell: Yes

How to Acquire Disguise Self

Disguise Self can be acquired by the following classes:
